title: Bookworm Deluxe wordlist not understood. Any insights?
content: I am looking at the "wordlist.txt" file for Bookworm Deluxe (an old game by PopCap), and I have not been able to make sense of it. Most of the lines seem to be pieces of words, often with a single digit prefixing them. These numbers do not constantly represent a same letter combination, as 2rdvark would seem like 2 is "aa", but 2s is also in the list, and "aas" is not a word. Take note that the game has to have letter rarity information somewhere, but bonus words have their own separate file. Here is the file as a Gist.

answers_data.content:
This answer is based on this post on codegolf

```
aahing

aal
aaliis
aals
aardvark
aardvarks
aardwolf
aardwolves

```
